colorTheory.description: The color palette combines a professional teal with a dark secondary color and a vibrant accent color to create a balanced and engaging visual experience.
colorTheory.mood: The palette conveys professionalism, reliability, and creativity.
colorTheory.accessibility: The palette ensures good color contrast for readability and accessibility, adhering to WCAG guidelines.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The teal primary color is complemented by the dark secondary color and accent color, creating a harmonious balance throughout the document.
